dcterms:creator: A. P. B. Veyseh
F. Dernoncourt
Q. H. Tran
T. H. Nguyen
dcterms:description: A dataset for acronym identification and disambiguation, containing a corpus of 6,786 English papers from arXiv, consisting of 2,031,592 sentences that could be used for data annotation. The dataset includes 62,441 samples where each sample involves a sentence, an ambiguous acronym, and its correct meaning.
dcterms:title: SciAD
